Question: In November 2006, this person and Paula Wagner announced that they had taken over United Artists film studio.
Hints: There, this person attended the just opened Robert Hopkins Public School for much of grade four as well as grade five.
On March 21, 2007 this person signed on to play Claus von Stauffenberg, the protagonist.
No lawsuit was ever filed and this person was included more prominently in the 2005 list.
